src:
Diisukan Maju Pilbup Pandeglang, Susi Pudjiastuti: Hoax!
03 Nov 2019, 11:55 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Nama Susi Pudjiastuti diisukan maju pemilihan Bupati Pandeglang yang digelar pada 2020. Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan era 2014-2019 ini angkat suara soal isu maju Pilbup Pandeglang.
Ramainya isu Susi sebagai bakal cabup Pandeglang terjadi salah satunya karena posting-an akun Instagram infopandeglang. Wanita kelahiran Pangandaran itu masuk ke salah satu dari 10 nama yang digadang-gadang maju Pilbup Pandeglang.
Selain Susi, nama-nama yang disebut maju Pilbup Pandeglang adalah petahana Irna Narulita Dimyati, Aap Aptadi, Moch Nabil Jayabaya, Tb Dedi Suwendi Gumelar, Thoni Fathoni Mukson, Yoyon Sujana, Oji Fahruroji, Andiara Aprilia Hikmat, dan Krisyanto 'Jamrud'. Munculnya nama Susi dalam daftar cabup Pandeglang ini ramai mendapat tanggapan.
text:
Rumored to Go Forward Pandeglang Pilbup, Susi Pudjiastuti: Hoax!
03 Nov 2019, 11:55 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - The name of Susi Pudjiastuti is rumored to advance the Pandeglang Regent elections held in 2020. The Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries in the 2014-2019 era raised a voice about the advanced issues of the Pandeglang Election.
The lively issue of Susi as a prospect of Pandeglang happened, one of which was the posting of the Instagram account infopandeglang. The woman born in Pangandaran entered one of the 10 names that were predicted by Pandeglang Pilbup.
In addition to Susi, the names that were called forward by Pandeglang Pilbup were incumbent Irna Narulita Dimyati, Aap Aptadi, Moch Nabil Jayabaya, Tb Dedi Suwendi Gumelar, Thoni Fathoni Mukson, Yoyon Sujana, Oji Fahruroji, Andiara Aprilia Hikmat, and Krisyanto 'Jamrud'. The appearance of Susi's name in the Pandeglang cabup list has received a lot of responses.
